title: The Art of Money Getting
author: P. T. Barnum
description: A short guide on achieving financial success.
longDescription: P. T. Barnum, the legendary entertainer and co-founder of the Barnum and Bailey Circus, was not just a successful businessman, but a philanthropist and writer as well. This short, pamphlet-length work distills Barnum's advice on achieving success and wealth, in his own words.
